title: Understanding the Concept
text: The average score of a sample is a measure that summarizes the data. It represents a characteristic of the sample.

title: Sample vs. Population
text: A statistic is a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample, while a parameter describes a characteristic of a population.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: Given that the average score is calculated from a sample of $$10$$ students, what is this measure called?
